Rajasthan.name: Ajmer
Rajasthan.description: Famous for Ajmer Sharif Dargah.

Rajasthan.name: Alwar
Rajasthan.description: Known for Sariska Tiger Reserve and Bhangarh Fort.

Rajasthan.name: Anupgarh
Rajasthan.description: New district formed from Sri Ganganagar region.

Rajasthan.name: Balotra
Rajasthan.description: Recently created district, famous for textile industries.

Rajasthan.name: Baran
Rajasthan.description: Known for its waterfalls and forests.

Rajasthan.name: Barmer
Rajasthan.description: Desert district near Pakistan border, known for crafts.

Rajasthan.name: Beawar
Rajasthan.description: Industrial town newly formed from Ajmer region.

Rajasthan.name: Bharatpur
Rajasthan.description: Home to Keoladeo National Park (Bird Sanctuary).

Rajasthan.name: Bhilwara
Rajasthan.description: Textile city of Rajasthan.

Rajasthan.name: Bikaner
Rajasthan.description: Famous for Junagarh Fort and sweets.

Rajasthan.name: Bundi
Rajasthan.description: Known for stepwells and palaces.

Rajasthan.name: Chittorgarh
Rajasthan.description: Historic fort city symbolizing Rajput valor.

Rajasthan.name: Churu
Rajasthan.description: Gateway to the Thar Desert, known for havelis.

Rajasthan.name: Dausa
Rajasthan.description: Famous for Mehandipur Balaji Temple.

Rajasthan.name: Deeg
Rajasthan.description: Known for forts and palaces near Bharatpur.

Rajasthan.name: Dholpur
Rajasthan.description: Famous for red sandstone and Chambal river.

Rajasthan.name: Didwana-Kuchaman
Rajasthan.description: Newly formed district from Nagaur region.

Rajasthan.name: Dungarpur
Rajasthan.description: Known for tribal culture and architecture.

Rajasthan.name: Gangapur City
Rajasthan.description: Newly created district near Sawai Madhopur.

Rajasthan.name: Hanumangarh
Rajasthan.description: Agricultural hub known for Ghaggar River.

Rajasthan.name: Jaipur
Rajasthan.description: The Pink City, capital of Rajasthan.

Rajasthan.name: Jaisalmer
Rajasthan.description: Golden City with desert fort and dunes.

Rajasthan.name: Jalore
Rajasthan.description: Famous for granite and ancient temples.

Rajasthan.name: Jhalawar
Rajasthan.description: Known for waterfalls and scenic beauty.

Rajasthan.name: Jhunjhunu
Rajasthan.description: Part of Shekhawati region, known for havelis.

Rajasthan.name: Jodhpur
Rajasthan.description: The Blue City with Mehrangarh Fort.

Rajasthan.name: Karauli
Rajasthan.description: Known for Kaila Devi Temple.

Rajasthan.name: Kekri
Rajasthan.description: Recently created district from Ajmer region.

Rajasthan.name: Khairthal-Tijara
Rajasthan.description: New district formed from Alwar region.

Rajasthan.name: Kota
Rajasthan.description: Education hub and industrial city.

Rajasthan.name: Nagaur
Rajasthan.description: Known for Nagaur Fort and cattle fair.

Rajasthan.name: Neem Ka Thana
Rajasthan.description: New district carved from Sikar region.

Rajasthan.name: Pali
Rajasthan.description: Industrial town known for handicrafts.

Rajasthan.name: Phalodi
Rajasthan.description: Newly formed district near Jodhpur region.

Rajasthan.name: Rajsamand
Rajasthan.description: Famous for marble and lakes.

Rajasthan.name: Salumbar
Rajasthan.description: New tribal-dominated district from Udaipur.

Rajasthan.name: Sanchore
Rajasthan.description: Desert area known for agriculture and trade.

Rajasthan.name: Sawai Madhopur
Rajasthan.description: Home of Ranthambore National Park.

Rajasthan.name: Shahpura
Rajasthan.description: Newly formed from Bhilwara region.

Rajasthan.name: Sikar
Rajasthan.description: Part of Shekhawati, known for education hubs.

Rajasthan.name: Sirohi
Rajasthan.description: Mount Abu hill station located here.

Rajasthan.name: Sri Ganganagar
Rajasthan.description: Planned city known as the 'Food Basket of Rajasthan'.

Rajasthan.name: Tonk
Rajasthan.description: Known for old havelis and mosques.

Rajasthan.name: Udaipur
Rajasthan.description: City of Lakes and royal palaces.
